attributes.action: Publish league tables for Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These league tables to show attendance in the chambers, membership and attendance of committees, time spent on Government business and other Governmental duties.  This tables would be published to show the performance of MPs by geographical area, political persuasion and other factors such as gender.  To bring the Governing of the Country into line with the existing requirements for Local Government, Health Authorities, Emergency Services, Etc.
